action.action-desc: Mr. Hill (for himself and Mr. Sherman) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To prohibit the Secretary of the Treasury from engaging in transactions involving the exchange of Special Drawing Rights issued by the International Monetary Fund that are held by the Islamic Republic of Iran, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Iran SDR Exchange Prohibition Act of 2023.

subsection.text: The Secretary of the Treasury may not engage in any transaction involving the exchange of Special Drawing Rights issued by the International Monetary Fund and held by the Islamic Republic of Iran.
The Secretary of the Treasury shallâ€”

paragraph.text: vigorously advocate that the government of each member country of the International Monetary Fund, to the extent that the member country issues a freely usable currency, prohibit transactions involving the exchange of Special Drawing Rights held by the Islamic Republic of Iran; and

direct the United States Executive Director of the International Monetary Fund to use the voice and vote of the United States to oppose any allocation of Special Drawing Rights to the Islamic Republic of Iran.
